long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your ChatGPT experience with QuickPrompts. Type faster, use templates, and streamline your AI conversations.

Ghostype - Quick Text Expansion for ChatGPT

Type faster in ChatGPT with unlimited text shortcuts. Just type "/" and let Ghostype do the rest.

What it does:
• Type "/" to see all your Quick Texts
• Press TAB to expand
• Create unlimited shortcuts
• Organize with drag & drop

Perfect for:
• Frequently used responses
• Code snippets
• Common instructions
• Template messages

No account needed. Works offline. Your Quick Texts stay private.

Get started in seconds:
1. Click Add Quick Text
2. Type "/" to use
3. That's it!
